title: Transactions are rejected
description: Incoming transactions can be rejected when they have been waiting in a queue for an extended period. This monitor calculates the rate of transactions rejected due to queuing for too long, which helps spot performance issues or bottlenecks in the system.

definition.message: A significant proportion of transactions started are being rejected having been queued for too long. This may indicate that the database cluster cannot keep up with the workload.
definition.name: FoundationDB High Level of Rejected Transactions
